name: mris_init_global_tractography
description: Initializes global tractography for a given subject and parcellation.

inputs.description: The subject on which to perform tractography.
inputs.name: Subject

inputs.description: The parcellation to use for tractography.
inputs.name: Parcellation

inputs.description: Output volume of the initialized global tractography.
inputs.name: Output Volume

author: FreeSurfer Developers
